Download this file to add invert mouse settings:

http://cracko.250free.com/Jedi%20Knight%20-%20DFII.zip

Also, I rushed the compilation big time. You can only play the game with the original DFII JK discs. I've included a No-CD crack in the file above.

To have the movies played in the game, copy all the folder and files located in "Jedi Knight - Dark Forces II\GAMEDATA\RESOURCE" to your installed Jedi Knight RESOURCE directory.

Note that, since you have to update the game in order to use the no-cd crack, the unofficial patch won't work. It only works with 1.00 sadly... I'm not sure about the other Limit patch.
